title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Frozen
description: A fearless princess sets off on a journey to find her sister, whose icy powers have trapped their kingdom in eternal winter.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A young woman discovers the kindness within a cursed beast as she learns to look beyond appearances.

title: Aladdin
description: A street-smart young man discovers a magical genie and uses his wishes to win the heart of a princess.

title: Toy Story
description: Toys come to life when humans aren't around, and a cowboy doll feels threatened by a flashy new space ranger.

title: Moana
description: A spirited teenager sails across the ocean to save her island and discover her true destiny.

title: Zootopia
description: A rookie bunny cop and a sly fox con artist uncover a conspiracy in a city of anthropomorphic animals.

title: Mulan
description: A courageous young woman disguises herself as a man to take her father’s place in the army and save China.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A timid clownfish braves the ocean to rescue his kidnapped son with the help of a forgetful friend.

title: Tangled
description: A long-haired princess escapes her tower with a charming thief and discovers the world beyond.

title: Coco
description: A boy who dreams of becoming a musician journeys to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family’s history.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A tech prodigy forms a superhero team with his inflatable robot to uncover a dangerous plot.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat with a passion for cooking forms an unlikely partnership with a young kitchen worker in Paris.

title: Up
description: An elderly man ties thousands of balloons to his house to fulfill a lifelong dream, accompanied by a persistent young scout.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
description: A video game villain sets out to become a hero but ends up saving the arcade instead.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes is forced into action to save the world from a new villain.

title: Inside Out
description: The emotions inside a young girl's mind struggle to help her adjust to a major life change.

title: Encanto
description: A girl born without magical powers must save her enchanted family and home when their magic begins to fade.

title: Turning Red
description: A teenage girl starts turning into a giant red panda whenever she feels strong emotions.

title: Brave
description: A headstrong princess defies tradition and must undo a curse she accidentally brings upon her family after a wish goes terribly wrong.
